wondering if someone could help me to get this to work. I am quite new to this. Can I burn this to a cd-r? Thanks in advance

You can indeed burn this one to a disk. When downloaded it will be as a folder contaning 3 subfolders. Go to the filder named CD1 and find the file called pot-lemony01.rar and run it. If you got the propper software installed (winrar, winzip or other such), the file should open up in a window. Unpack both files contaned within. Now you should be able to burn the movie to a disk, using any burning software that can handle a cue file. When done, repeat with CD2 and you got yourself a nice movie on 2 CDs that you can run on your DVD player. Cheers mate.
